channel.title: Use the Redash api to create visualizations and got sqlalchemy.exc.TimeoutError
channel.description:
We use the Redash API to create visualizations, and then we got the error `sqlalchemy.exc.TimeoutError` `sqlalchemy.exc.TimeoutError:QueuePool limit of size 5 overflow 10 reached, connection time out, timeout 30`
Anything we need modify in the docker-compose file?

item.title: Use the Redash api to create visualizations and got sqlalchemy.exc.TimeoutError
item.dc:creator: Teslenko
item.description:
Thanks, dtian118! Iâ€™ll try it.

Read full topic
item.source: Use the Redash api to create visualizations and got sqlalchemy.exc.TimeoutError

item.title: Use the Redash api to create visualizations and got sqlalchemy.exc.TimeoutError
item.dc:creator: dtian118
item.description:
yeah, I used the developer version, so what I did was add following two parameters in the yml file:

SQLALCHEMY_POOL_SIZE: 100
SQLALCHEMY_MAX_OVERFLOW: 100

Read full topic
item.source: Use the Redash api to create visualizations and got sqlalchemy.exc.TimeoutError
